Header: Canadian High Commissioner Calls on Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna
Content: High Commissioner of Canada in Sri Lanka, H.E David Mckinnon paid a courtesy call on Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, Commander Security Forces - Jaffna on Thursday (6) along with the Political Officer, Mr. P Gobinath in the embassy. The delegation discussed matters pertaining to the reconciliation process in the Jaffna Peninsula including Land release, etc The Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna provided them with a very comprehensive description on the ongoing process.
